r.s: A Class the facilitates the search of filesystems
r.d: File_Find, created as a replacement for its Perl counterpart, also named File_Find, is a directory searcher, which handles, globbing, recursive directory searching, as well as a slew of other cool features.
r.n: QA release package 2.0 Bug #2132 Doc state &search() can be called statically. It isn't true. Bug #2773 Directories with other directories named 0 Bug #4669 Repeated calls to search or maptree return multiple copies of results Bug #4983 Error in install Bug #4994 Close TODO Bug #7966 File_Find Stream Support Bug #14816 Unit test failures
